#summary features of the next release.

With the 1.3.2 version:

Will be added placeholders get and set for dynamic methods:

{{{${source.get}}}} get method for source field
{{{${source.set}}}} set method for source field
{{{${destination.get}}}}  get method for destination field
{{{${destination.set}}}}  set method for destination field

This allows us to implement interesting functions as: flatten and projection
